resources.string: Send and receive Google Talk instant messages
Allows applications to use the Google Talk service to send and receive instant messages. Using this service will incur data usage. Malicious applications may cause excess data usage.

Allows applications to send data messages to other users with Google accounts. The application can send messages in the background, with or without your explicit consent. Using this service will incur data usage. Malicious applications may cause excess data usage.
Allows applications to receive messages and notifications sent by the application server. Using this service will incur data usage. Malicious applications may cause excess data usage.
Can broadcast data messages received from the internet to applications registered to listen for them.
Can send broadcasts to Android Market requesting application installation and removal.
Send heartbeat to Google Talk server
Can send a heartbeat packet to the Google Talk server to ensure the health of the connection.
%s wants to be able to chat
You have received a group chat invitation from %s
You cannot send messages over 2000 characters in length.
Google Talk failed to login. If this is a Google Apps account, confirm that Chat service is enabled for this account.
